name: Burnout Elf
description:
You play as an elf which lost passion for his job a long time ago.

Nowadays only abusing Christmas goodies silences the voices in your head.

Break the cycle and sabotage the factory.

Controls: WASD, F - interact, Q,E switch goodies, Space - use

Music by Grand_Project from Pixabay

Music by Dmitry Taras from Pixabay

Sound Effects from Pixabay

Sound effects from Freesound
